casebody.data:
OCEAN HILL
v.
CURRITUCK BOARD OF COMM. No. 382PA06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 20, 2006. Jonathan C. Krisko, Charlotte, Thomas P. Nash, IV, Elizabeth City, for Ocean Hill I Prop. Owners Asso. C. Everett Thompson, II, Elizabeth City, for Ocean Hill Joint Venture et al. Katherine F. McKenzie, Raleigh, for Currituck County Bd. of Comm. Paul A. Meyer, Assistant General Counsel, for NC Asso. of County Commissioners. Andrew L. Romanet, Jr., General Counsel, Gregory F. Schwitzgebel, III, Senior Assistant General Counsel, for NC League of Municipalities.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th day of October 2006 by Respondents for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Respondent (Ocean Hill I Prop. Owners Asso.) shall have up to and including the 20th day of November 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 20th day of October 2006."
